snippet.title: Vertical Drop Heroes HD Trailer
snippet.description:
Latest trailer for my upcoming game Vertical Drop Heroes HD, a procedurally generated platformer RPG, coming soon to PC and Mac!

Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=205631999
Game Website: http://nerdook-productions.com/

Music used under license with permission:
Hybrid Trailer by Jeffrey Peterson (Sky Productions)
(http://audiojungle.net/user/Sky-Productions)
